LightningComponentBundle.description: A Lightning Web Component that displays records from multiple objects on a calendar.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: The title to be used at the top of the card.

property.name: defaultDuration
property.label: Default Calendar Duration
property.description: The default duration (day, week, month, year) that appears when the component first loads.

property.name: defaultType
property.label: Default Calendar Type
property.description: The type of calendar view that appears when the component first loads.

property.name: objects
property.label: Objects
property.description: A JSON string representing an array of objects containing the object API name, the API names of the start and end fields, and the color. Please see the documentation for details.

property.name: shadeWeekends
property.label: Shade Weekends
property.description: Check if weekends should be shaded.

property.name: showWeekNumbers
property.label: Show Week Numbers
property.description: Show week numbers in the calendar.

property.name: licenseKey
property.label: License Key
property.description: FullCalendar license key

event.name: leceventchanged
event.label: Calendar Entry Changed
event.description: This event fires when an entry in the calendar gets created, updated, or deleted.
